A number representing the reference count of `cf`.

## Discussion

You increment the reference count using the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRetain] function, and decrement the reference count using the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRelease] function.

# CFGetRetainCount(_:)

**Function**

Returns the reference count of a Core Foundation object.

## Declaration

```swift
func CFGetRetainCount(_ cf: CFTypeRef!) -> CFIndex
```

## Parameters

- **cf**: The CFType object to examine.

## Return Value

A number representing the reference count of `cf`.

## Discussion

You increment the reference count using the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRetain] function, and decrement the reference count using the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRelease] function.

This function may be useful for debugging memory leaks. You normally do not use this function, otherwise.

## Memory Management

- **CFGetAllocator(_:)**: Returns the allocator used to allocate a Core Foundation object.
